content.rendered:
Exploring Religious and Spiritual Diversity in Southern CA

Souljourns are a way for La Verne students to explore the remarkable religious and spiritual diversity of Southern California. Each semester, we’ll visit different temples, churches, mosques, and religious communities. All students are welcome to participate. To get a current schedule and to reserve places on these trips, contact the Office of Religious and Spiritual Life.
